attributes.action: Halt the closure of North Tees general Hospital (NTGH)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a resubmission of a petition which was rejected for being party political!

The Government plan to close North Tees General Hospital and the University of Hartlepool Hospital causing suffering for people of both boroughs. Please sign the petition to prevent this occuring.
